member.name: MSIPATCHSEQUENCEINFOA
member.summary: The MSIPATCHSEQUENCEINFO structure is used by the and functions.

member.name: MSIPATCHSEQUENCEINFOA.szPatchData
member.summary: Pointer to the path of a patch file, an XML blob, or an XML file.

summary.para: Qualifies szPatchData as a patch file, an XML blob, or an XML file.

listheader.description: The szPatchData member refers to a path of a patch file.
The szPatchData member refers to a path of a XML file.
The szPatchData member refers to an XML blob.

member.name: MSIPATCHSEQUENCEINFOA.dwOrder
member.summary: Set to an integer that indicates the sequence of the patch in the order of application. The sequence starts with 0. If a patch is not applicable to the specified .msi file, or if the function fails, dwOrder is set to -1.

member.name: MSIPATCHSEQUENCEINFOA.uStatus
member.summary: Set to ERROR_SUCCESS or the corresponding Win32 error code.
